root.name: Help Wanted
root.description: Help Wanted: 50 Wacky Jobs is a mini-game compilation for the Wii from Hudson Entertainment, Inc. Like the title implies, it has a selection of about 50 mini-games, with Haunted House Monster, Clown, Make-up Artist, Pinch Hitter, Pizza Chef, Stunt Car Driver, Sumo Referee, Action Hero and Sushi Master to name just a few. The game includes multiple difficulty levels for the more experienced at the mini-games and a multiplayer feature that allows for head-to-head play on up to fifteen different jobs. The game has received mixed reviews, with some critics calling Help Wanted a good mini-game collection with enough good mini-games to keep you entertained for a while while other critics criticize the game simple and boring, with kids as it's intended audience. The game currently has 65 on Metacritic with mixed or average reviews.
